scripts.start: npm run web & npm run server
scripts.web: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react babel-preset-stage-0 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy ] ] public/src/index.js -o public/src/bundle.js -v
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react babel-preset-stage-0 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy ] ] public/src/index.js -o public/src/bundle.js
scripts.prod: npm run build | uglifyjs -mc warnings=false > public/src/bundle.js
